main event: Four white circular objects were observed in a triangular formation in the Northern sky over Cedar Grove, New Jersey.
interesting points: The objects were approximately 3-4 feet in diameter,The sighting occurred at twilight and lasted for 45 seconds,The objects were traveling west and gained altitude,The observer had a scientific background as a chemist,The atmospheric conditions were clear with slight haze.
sighted object: four white circular objects in the sky
witness description: a normal 31-year-old male with a scientific background (Chemist)
